channel.title: [639] Client Combat Level
channel.description:
Hey, Well I've got a request from a friend to make him CB 1337 on my server, and the problem is that the combat level is written with a Byte or a Short I need to change it to an int, what class/where is the combat level string declared in the client?
TL;DR: What class in a 639 client displays combat level?
If this is in the wrong section or something, please move it.
